Summon a flaming sphere that damages nearby enemies and objects. You can move the sphere. It emits a bright light.

18m DEX Save Concentration

Flaming Sphere is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Flaming Sphere is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Flaming Sphere Information

Description: Summon a flaming sphere that damages nearby enemies and objects. You can move the sphere. It emits a bright light. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Duration: 10 turns Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Dexterity On Save: Targets still take half damage.

How to Acquire Flaming Sphere
